original_title: Those who want to rescue country from economic crisis will support DDR: Prasanna
original_body_lines: Those who want to rescue the country without going back to the era of queues will support the Domestic Debt Restructuring (DDR) programme, while those who want to see the country go back to anarchy will oppose it, Chief Government Whip, Minister Prasanna Ranatunga said today.
He said people will realise who really wants to rescue the country from the economic crisis and who will not.

"The opposition likes when there are fuel queues and no gas. They want the country to go back to anarchy. Only then can they engage in their political agenda," he told reporters after the Gampaha District Development Committee meeting.

The Minister said there was no discussion on a Cabinet reshuffle during the recent Cabinet meeting and only ways and means to rescue the country from the economic crisis were discussed. (Ajith Siriwardana)
